column4: Hi to install tar.gz files, then you need to type sudo apt-get install (file)tar.gz , is that right :) ?
what are you trying to install?
im trying to install this one .. aircrack-ng-1.0-rc3.tar.gz
what features are in it that you need that aren't in the aircrack-ng that's available in the repositories?
What do you mean by in the repositories ?
you can install that version with your package manager, such as synaptic without needing to compile stuff
